content.text:
HON. FREDERICA S. WILSON

                               of florida

                    in the house of representatives

                      Wednesday, November 8, 2017
content.speaker: None

content.text:
Ms. WILSON of Florida. Mr. Speaker, I was not present for the 
following votes because I


was in my congressional district tending to urgent business. Had I been 
present, I would have voted in the following manner:
  YEA on Roll Call No. 605; NAY on Roll Call No. 606; YEA on Roll Call 
No. 607; YEA on Roll Call No. 608; YEA on Roll Call No. 609; NAY on 
Roll Call No. 610; NAY on Roll Call No. 611; and NAY on Roll Call No. 
612.
content.speaker: Ms. WILSON of Florida
